description: Value to be displayed in the centre of a graphic.
Width and height of the graphic in pixels
Thickness of the graphic ring in pixels
Optional duration of the generation animation in milliseconds. No animation is triggered when set to undefined.
Colour of the percentage and completion path of the graphic (valid css colour string).
Colour of the ring path of the graphic (valid css colour string).
Optional label text displayed under the percentage value.
Colour of the optional label text (valid css colour string).
Label font weight (valid css fontWeight string).
Percentage font weight (valid css fontWeight string).
The ceiling used to calculate the percentage / fraction.
